page.title: 15THE POSTMISTRESS'S STORY
page.content:
I get up between half past six and seven. I sort out the daily newspapers for my son to deliver around the village. Before the shop opens I go to Garforth and Castleford to buy the bread and greens for sale in the shop. The shop opens at 9.00am. I keep the fridge clean. The shop is busy, so I have a sandwich at 1.00pm when I close for a rest. I close the shop at 5.30pm when I clean it. I like most food, except fish fingers. I prefer tea to coffee. I enjoy a pint of lager at "The Greyhound"! In my spare time I do a lot in the village. I am a member of the Parish Council, and a School Govenor. I like reading in bed. I go for walks with the dog. I like driving.
{Continued}
